alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:20AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Collingsworth County through 545 AM CDT... At 520 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Dodson, or 11 miles east of Wellington, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dodson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
